Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

OOC: Nice new title style, huh? I hope I don't have too many characters, bu=
t this character is really important right now...

BIC: Divitri/Other Maxim=
als:

A small, one man ship lands near the Maximal base. Not right near it =
but a short distance, still. The Maximal base was small in the distance, bu=
t Divitri (Thanks Logo!) knew she had to go there, her Maximal instinct was=
 guiding her. She had to complete an experiment, she was to find some troub=
led Maximals to bond with first, at least 2 of them, to build her strength =
and knowledge, and then she could carry about the rest of her mission. She =
climbs from the ship and starts towards the Maximal base, but decides to st=
op and watch first, thinking it would be a better idea to survey the land b=
efore making a hasty run in. She watches a few robots go inside of the base=
.

Klant walks slowly back into the Cybertronian Fire. Tarantopulous follow=
s, and he is followed by Inzola and Stranato.

Klant: I have failed again. =
What good is a warrior who fails all of the time, anyway?

Tarantopulous: Y=
ou did no worse than us.

Inzola: Being a Maximal is getting harder and har=
der.

Stranato: I thought I was great out there.

Tarantopulous, Inzola, an=
d Klant all look at Stranato.

Diskus, still outside of the base, starts to=
 whine and moan.

Diskus: Diskus wants to help, but he can't figure out whe=
re he is! This not Alliance, this Maximals! Diskus failed them, though, Dis=
kus always fails. Diskus always failed Deemos, too! Not fair! Diskus going =
home, Diskus going out to his old stasis pod and never coming back! Mr. Buz=
zy Maximals won't miss Diskus anyway.

Diskus, not bothering to change to b=
east mode, flies out away from the base, and passes Divitri.

Divitri: Hey,=
 wait!

Diskus stops and lands. he starts stomping the gorund furiously.

D=
iskus: What!? What!? What!? What!? WHAT!?

Divitri: I think you're okay.

D=
iskus: Diskus not...You really think so? You like Diskus? What makes you li=
ke Diskus? Diskus never do nothing exciting. He never did anything good bef=
ore. Diskus betrayed Maximals before, and joined Alliance. Diskus so bad, D=
iskus ashamed.

Divitri: So, you have lived a troubled life?

Diskus: Yes, =
Diskus has been nothing but trouble. Diskus should be dead. Diskus never go=
ing back to Maximal base, ever! Ohh.

Divitri: Maybe I cn help you. You are=
 pretty cute.

Diskus: Diskus not...You really think so?

Divitri: Yes.

Di=
skus: Diskus must have found the only person in the mooniverse who likes hi=
m! Diskus happier now, but Diskus got to go back to pod, never return.

Div=
itri: No you don't, you can come with me. We can be together!

Diskus: You =
want to be Diskus' girlfriend?

Divitri: I guess that's what it's like.

Di=
skus: Yippee! Thank you, Diskus now happy at last! Where we go? Not back to=
 base, right?

Divitri: No, but soon I do want you back at the base.

Disku=
s: Ohh, but--

Divitri: No, it's okay, you'll be fine there. You'll be with=
 me.

Diskus: Okay, Diskus understand.

Divitri: I was hoping you would...
